thread.title: Macys.com: Joy Mangano My Little Steamer Mini Just $11.99 (Regularly $39.99)
thread.title_full: Macys.com: Joy Mangano My Little Steamer Mini Just $11.99 (Regularly $39.99)

author: mpricehip2save
title: Macys.com: Joy Mangano My Little Steamer Mini Just $11.99 (Regularly $39.99)
text:
Not a Big fan of ironing clothes? For a limited time, head over to Macys.com where they dropped the price on this Joy Mangano My Little Steamer Mini down to just $11.99 (regularly $39.99). The mini steamer is perfect for on the go. Tuck it into your suitcase to get wrinkles out of your clothes in a snap while away from home.

As another option, you can score this Deluxe Joy Mangano My Little Steamer for just $17.99 (regularly $59.99). This larger deluxe version will make your iron jealous, as it steams out wrinkles and creases with no ironing board needed.

PLUS, starting today through 3/27, for any single transaction of $50+ you make in stores or online you’ll get a $10 (spend $50-74.99), $15 (spend $75-99.99), $20 (spend $100-149.99), $30 (spend $150-199.99) or $40 (spend $200 or more) Macy’s Money Reward Card to spend from 3/28 – 4/2.
Keep in mind that shipping is free with a $99+ order OR score free shipping on ANY size order when you add select beauty items to your cart – prices start as low as $4. Or – choose free in-store pickup, if available near you.
(Thanks, Rebecca!)
